Home Concerts Bands Contacts Privacy Policy RockRave is committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring the security of your personal information. This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, disclose, and protect your information when you visit our website or use our services. Information We Collect When you visit the RockRave website, we may collect certain information from you, including: - Personal information such as your name, email address, and phone number when you sign up for an account or purchase tickets - Location information when you use our website or mobile app - Information about your device, such as the type of device you use, operating system, and browser type - Usage information, such as the pages you visit, the links you click on, and the content you interact with How We Use Your Information We may use the information we collect for the following purposes: - To provide you with the products and services you request, such as processing ticket orders and sending you event updates - To personalize your experience on our website and tailor our content to your interests - To improve our website and services, including analyzing user behavior and trends - To communicate with you about upcoming events, promotions, and news related to RockRave - To protect the security and integrity of our website and services Disclosure of Your Information We may share your information with third parties in certain circumstances, including: - With event organizers and promoters to facilitate ticket purchases and event planning - With service providers who help us deliver our products and services, such as payment processors and data analytics companies - With law enforcement or government agencies in response to legal requests or to protect our rights and property We do not sell or rent your personal information to third parties for marketing purposes. Data Security RockRave takes the security of your information seriously and implements measures to protect it from unauthorized access, disclosure, or alteration. However, no method of transmission over the internet or electronic storage is 100% secure, and we cannot guarantee the absolute security of your data. Cookies RockRave uses cookies to collect information about your browsing behavior and preferences. Cookies are small text files stored on your device that track your activity on our website. You can disable cookies in your browser settings, but this may affect the functionality of our website. Third-Party Links Our website may contain links to third-party websites that are not controlled by RockRave. We are not responsible for the privacy practices of these websites and recommend that you review their privacy policies before providing any personal information. Children's Privacy RockRave does not knowingly collect personal information from children under the age of 13. If you believe that we have collected information from a child under 13, please contact us immediately so that we can take appropriate action. Changes to this Privacy Policy RockRave reserves the right to update or modify this Privacy Policy at any time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the updated policy on our website. Your continued use of our website after the changes are made constitutes your acceptance of the updated policy. Their performances often take place in music clubs and festivals, where they attract audiences with their talent and charisma. The Panchatantra Fusion group has become popular due to its unique sound and friendly atmosphere on stage.
